hero.title: Building Better Spending Habits
hero.subtitle: Simple systems to make good choices automatic

content.text: Habits beat willpower. Small guardrails placed near spending triggers reduce friction and save money without feeling deprived.

content.title: Two-Minute Rule
content.text: If a purchase takes less than two minutes of thought, add a 24-hour cooling-off step.

items.title: Default Settings
items.description: Turn off one-click checkout and save-only cards to create pause.

items.title: Spending Triggers
items.description: Note time, mood, and apps that lead to impulse buys.

items.title: Budget Anchors
items.description: Name 2-3 priorities (debt, emergency fund) to compare each purchase against.

items: Disable one-click on Amazon and app stores
Create a 24-hour list note on your phone

content.text: Keep a shared wishlist; review weekly instead of buying instantly.
